result.markdown:
---
title: "Randomized Controlled Trials"
---


::: callout-note
You can delete everything in here and start fresh.
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_2c4fa04b2fe0539235f9f03abd63fc61'}

```{.r .cell-code}
abtest_online <- readRDS("D:/TU Hamburg/Semester_5/Causal Data Science for Business Analytics/Causal_Data_Science_Data/Causal_Data_Science_Data/abtest_online.rds")
View(abtest_online)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_550845d8cf341646f432a256d9fb01f9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
compare_covariates_purchase <-ggplot(abtest_online, aes(x=chatbot,y=purchase_amount,color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  stat_summary(geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .5,
               fun.data = "mean_se", 
               fun.args = list(mult=1.96),
               show.legend = F) +
  labs(x = "chatbot", y = "purchase_amount", title = "chatbot affect on purchase amount")


compare_covariates_previous_visits <-ggplot(abtest_online, aes(x=chatbot,y=previous_visit,color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  stat_summary(geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .5,
               fun.data = "mean_se", 
               fun.args = list(mult=1.96),
               show.legend = F) +
  labs(x = "chatbot", y = "previous_visits", title = "chatbot affect on previous_visits")

compare_covariates_mobile_devices <-ggplot(abtest_online, aes(x=chatbot,y=mobile_device,color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  stat_summary(geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .5,
               fun.data = "mean_se", 
               fun.args = list(mult=1.96),
               show.legend = F) +
  labs(x = "chatbot", y = "mobile_devices", title = "chatbot affect on mobile_devices")

compare_covariates_purchase
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
compare_covariates_previous_visits
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
compare_covariates_mobile_devices 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-3.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_8c59efe73c9f1fa213294866f7a2a7fe'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm_chattbot_purchase <- lm(purchase_amount~chatbot, data = abtest_online)
summary(lm_chattbot_purchase)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = purchase_amount ~ chatbot, data = abtest_online)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -16.702 -14.478  -9.626  13.922  64.648 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)  16.7017     0.8374  19.944  < 2e-16 ***
#> chatbotTRUE  -7.0756     1.1796  -5.998 2.79e-09 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 18.65 on 998 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.0348,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.03383 
#> F-statistic: 35.98 on 1 and 998 DF,  p-value: 2.787e-09
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_b091ee21621cf5e6ecfd5e974b44f3e7'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm_chattbot_purchase <- lm(purchase_amount~chatbot * mobile_device, data = abtest_online)
summary(lm_chattbot_purchase)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = purchase_amount ~ chatbot * mobile_device, data = abtest_online)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>    Min     1Q Median     3Q    Max 
#> -16.98 -14.54  -9.95  14.13  65.24 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                               Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)                    16.9797     1.0152  16.725   <2e-16 ***
#> chatbotTRUE                    -7.0301     1.4284  -4.922    1e-06 ***
#> mobile_deviceTRUE              -0.8727     1.7987  -0.485    0.628    
#> chatbotTRUE:mobile_deviceTRUE  -0.1526     2.5369  -0.060    0.952    
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 18.66 on 996 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.03534,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.03244 
#> F-statistic: 12.16 on 3 and 996 DF,  p-value: 8.034e-08
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_aad943be8d243c33e185df783d2b6521'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm_purchase_logistics <- glm(purchase ~ chatbot, family=binomial(link='logit'), abtest_online)
summary(lm_purchase_logistics)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> glm(formula = purchase ~ chatbot, family = binomial(link = "logit"), 
#>     data = abtest_online)
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
#> (Intercept) -0.01613    0.08981  -0.180    0.857    
#> chatbotTRUE -0.98939    0.13484  -7.337 2.18e-13 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> (Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1)
#> 
#>     Null deviance: 1329.1  on 999  degrees of freedom
#> Residual deviance: 1273.3  on 998  degrees of freedom
#> AIC: 1277.3
#> 
#> Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4
```
:::
:::
